Module jBomberman

Class DecoratorTessera

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Figure
model.TesseraAbstract
view.DecoratorTessera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<BufferedImage>, PropWrapper, FootageFuncs
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedTessera
public abstract class DecoratorTessera extends TesseraAbstract implements Iterable<BufferedImage>, FootageFuncs
Decorated version of a TesseraAbstract to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way. Images are animated through List Collections. With this class the decorator mimics the methods of its component.
